name: Cube Link
description:
CubeLink is a flow puzzle game with a twist.
By spinning the cube around you can connect colours in every direction.
Unlock more challenging levels as you progress.


"i straight up think that level 22 is impossible" - Zedia

"Its a really fun solid game! It's surprisingly more difficult that I had anticipated :) " - Saran09

"Amazing game, possibly the hardest puzzle-type game i've seen" - JohnYT



- please note the current game might be not suited for people with color blindness
